headline: BAX Highlights EMR-Integrated Smart Pumps Boost Patient Safety & Care
summary: Baxter shows EMR-integrated smart pumps cut safety alerts and speed IV setup, backed by real-world data from over a million infusions at ASHP 2025.

raw.headline: BAX Highlights EMR-Integrated Smart Pumps Boost Patient Safety & Care
raw.summary: Baxter shows EMR-integrated smart pumps cut safety alerts and speed IV setup, backed by real-world data from over a million infusions at ASHP 2025.
